titles: Observations on the historie of The reign of King Charles published by H.L. Esq., for illustration of the story, and rectifying some mistakes and errors in the course thereof.
author: Heylyn, Peter, 1600-1662.
notes: Attributed to Peter Heylyn. Cf. BM.
"H.L." stands for Hamon L'Estrange. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: L'Estrange, Hamon, 1605-1660. --  Reign of King Charles.
